---
title: "ggplot fun"
output: html_document
---


```{r mtcars, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue") +
  geom_smooth(color = "red")
```

```{r mtcars, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) + 
  geom_point(color = "grey") + 
  stat_summary(fun.y = "mean", geom = "line", size = 1, linetype = "dashed")
```
